mapper.select: select p.*, w.member_id as wish_member_id from product p left join wish w on p.product_id = w.product_id where w.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into wish(product_id, member_id, rdate) value(#{product_id}, #{member_id}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from wish where product_id = #{product_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
